# Interactivity The great thing with using HTML is that you can make your notes as interactive as you like. This section shows you a few ways of introducing interactivity to your notes, but the possibilities are endless. ## Reveal Hidden Text You can hide and unhide some text (e.g. hints or optional solutions) as in the following example. :::example Use the "<details>" and "<summary>" html tags to hide and reveal text interactively. ::: {.cell} ```{.html .cell-code}
click to unhide Here is some hidden text.
``` :::
click to unhide.
